cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 575 mi SE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest toward the North Carolina/South Carolina coast, then forecast to slow and move inland across the Carolinas late Thursday into Saturday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cape Fear, North Carolina (Carolinas coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC (Hurricane Watch); Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC (Storm Surge Watch); north of NC/VA border to Cape Charles Light VA and Chesapeake Bay south of New Point Comfort (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Duck NC including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds (Hurricane & Storm-Surge Warnings); north of Duck NC to NC/VA border (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coastal South Carolina through North Carolina and portions of southeast Virginia
